name: Runaway Feb
description:
In a faraway universe, a Planet named Feb run away from its own Solar System and became rogue due to a Pandemic, in his case, a Blackhole is starting to ravage his home, His lifelong dream is to travel the cosmos, due to the limited supply of gases he can only supply himself with limited fuel, how long can Feb survive in his travel? 

The goal of the game:

- How long can Feb survive using limited thruster fuel

- How many cosmos can he travel before the blackhole caught up to him (Time Limit)

- Find the right portal to another cosmos while avoiding the asteroids

- Every minute, Two Fuel and Health pickups will spawn.

Controls:

W, S - look up and down

A, D - Look Left and Right

Left Shift - Activate Thrusters

Team Name: Unknown Salt
